description: This file defines the main React component 'StoryForm', which provides a user interface for inputting prompts, selecting genres, and generating stories. It includes internal state management, event handling, fetch API calls to a backend service, and rendering of UI elements such as text areas, buttons, and child components.

methods.name: generateStory
methods.description: Asynchronous function to handle story generation API call, manage loading state, handle errors, and update the story output.
